general_advisory: Provide sufficient irrigation to crops to reduce excess temperature. Keep paddy fields ponded...

advisory: The transplanted paddy is at flowering to maturity (ten to thirteen week) stage...
Due to differential day and night temperature, there are chances of blast disease incidence...
Due to rise in temperature there are chances of increase in stem borer infestation...
Due to rise in atmospheric temperature there are chances of infestation of thrips and aphids...
There may be chances of incidence of tikka disease in groundnut...
Farmer should apply 15-kg of Urea per acre for High yielding varieties and 20-kg of Urea per acre for hybrids...
There are chances of sucking pest like aphids, Jassids, thrips and whiteflies in Okra...
The larvae of brinjal shoot and fruit borer burrows into the petioles and tender shoots...
The mango hoppers multiply rapidly in cloudy weather...
The transplanted tomato crop is at fruit maturity to harvesting (thirteen to sixteen week) stage...
There are chances of infestation of whiteflies in Tomato Crop...
There are chances of infestation of fruit fly in cucurbit vegetables...
To manage fruit fly in cucurbits, prepare a poison bait by mixing 400-gram Jaggery and 8-ml Malathion...

Do not allow the cattle to graze in open fields during day hours...
Fish farmers, in case, have stocked fingerlings in the pond for fish culture...
The chicks and birds may suffer from heatstroke...
